name: Introductory Sanskrit
description: This introductory course looks at mastering the reading and writing of the Devanagari script and studying the grammar of the classical Sanskrit language. There will be close analytical reading of simple Sanskrit texts, which are used to reinforce the grammatical study done in the first half of this course. The aim is to bring students to the point where they are comfortably able, with the help of a dictionary, to read simple, narrative Sanskrit. Texts in Sanskrit. [72L, 24P]
